title: Add audit logging for admin actions
Invalidate sessions when user is deleted
Add Secure flag to session cookie
Add user allowlist/invite system for private access
Add rate limiting on OAuth endpoints
Add a user level of "Premium"
description: New user level, above "User", below "Admin" -- for now, they are able to receive emails about issue changes.

title: Users can star issues as favorites
description: Favorites should be a sortable column, set just by clicking a star in that column and filterable (show just starred issues; can combine with other filters).
